actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water Resources. Hearings held.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to undertake certain modifications at Abiquiu Dam in New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a set of emergency gates in the conduit of the Abiquiu Dam, New Mexico, at Federal expense. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to undertake certain modifications at Abiquiu Dam in New Mexico.
